long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When browsing the web, if you accidentally come across an interesting excerpt, instead of copying and pasting it into a note-taking app, you can use this extension to save it.

This extension has the following features:

Highlight the excerpt and save it.
When you activate the extension, a new tab opens to compile all the saved excerpts.
The saved excerpts are organized by time, from newest to oldest.
The saved excerpts include the source of the webpage.
You can delete excerpts at any time.
